amendatorysection.catchline: Collection of taxes; notice to taxpayer.
amendatorysection.para: The county treasurer shall, at any time prior to January 1 of each year, send a notice to each person on the personal tax roll and each person owing real estate taxes on mobile homes, cabin trailers, manufactured homes, or similar property assessed and taxed as improvements to leased land, advising such taxpayer of the amount of such taxes owed for that year.
